mapper.select: select a.* from ( SELECT BOARD_NUMBER, CLUB_NUMBER, CLUB_BOARD_WRITER, CLUB_BOARD_CONTENT, CLUB_BOARD_WDATE, CLUB_BOARD_VIEWS, CLUB_BOARD_TYPE, SCHEDULE_DATE, CLUB_BOARD_BLIND FROM CLUB_BOARD WHERE club_board_blind <> 'AH2' ORDER BY board_number desc ) a where rownum <=3
